bioconda.name: intervene
bioconda.summary: A tool for intersection of multiple gene or genomic region sets and visualization as venn diagrams, UpSet plots or pariwaise heatmaps

biocontainers.name: intervene
biocontainers.summary: A tool for intersection of multiple gene or genomic region sets and visualization as venn diagrams, upset plots or pariwaise heatmaps

biotools.summary: Tool for intersection and visualization of multiple gene or genomic region sets. Intervene contains three modules: venn to generate Venn diagrams of up to six sets, upset to generate UpSet plots of multiple sets, and pairwise to compute and visualize intersections of multiple sets as clustered heat maps.

bioschemas.name: Intervene
bioschemas.summary: Tool for intersection and visualization of multiple gene or genomic region sets. Intervene contains three modules: venn to generate Venn diagrams of up to six sets, upset to generate UpSet plots of multiple sets, and pairwise to compute and visualize intersections of multiple sets as clustered heat maps.

galaxy.bio_tools_summary: Tool for intersection and visualization of multiple gene or genomic region sets. Intervene contains three modules: venn to generate Venn diagrams of up to six sets, upset to generate UpSet plots of multiple sets, and pairwise to compute and visualize intersections of multiple sets as clustered heat maps.
